description.originalText: Addy was reliable and on time. She gave great care to my mother. She was gentle and compassionate. My mother liked her because she was kind to her.
Addy is reliable, kind and compassionate. She assist my father who was has stroke. She did her job perfectly.

description.displayText: Addy is a God send. She has become part of the family, and always goes above and beyond her duty. She has helped guide my family through some of the hard decisions associated with elder care. We had used nursing agencies before, but the level of attention Addy provides for my mother in law dwarf any efforts the agencies provide. She is absolutely wonderful.

description.displayText: Addie was so helpful to my family. She did a live-in for my father last year July. She was with him for 5 months before my father's passing. She is kind, respectful and took care of my father so well. They go out for walks, dinner and do some coloring together. We appreciate your help Addie.
description.originalText: Addie was so helpful to my family. She did a live-in for my father last year July. She was with him for 5 months before my father's passing. She is kind, respectful and took care of my father so well. They go out for walks, dinner and do some coloring together. We appreciate your help Addie.

description.displayText: I reached out to Addy in mid December after having an immediate need for a back-fill on my mom's case. Addy drove over on the same day of reach out to meet my mom and I and after a pleasant conversation, Addy agreed to start the next evening and continue through our 4 week back-fill need. My mom is 93 and has dementia so needs reminders and assistance with ADLs. Addy easily responded to my moms care needs in a professional and compassionate manner. She is very attentive to details and is extremely proactive with communication. It was so nice to have a caregiver reach out to me daily to let me know how things were going and on the rare occasion I reached out, she immediately responded. I highly recommend Addy!

description.displayText: Addy is superb.  She took care of my mother who has advanced Alzheimer's disease with such kindness, love and patience.  My mom would refer to Addy as her "friend".   Addy helped her out of bed,  get dressed, helped with morning hygiene routines and prepped her meals and fed my mom her meals.  She took her out on walks, outings and most of all patiently dealt with all of the mood swings with such grace.  I highly recommend Addy for your loved one, you won't be disappointed.  She's trustworthy and respectful on top of it all.
description.originalText: Addy is superb.  She took care of my mother who has advanced Alzheimer's disease with such kindness, love and patience.  My mom would refer to Addy as her "friend". She took her out on walks, outings and most of all patiently dealt with all of the mood swings with such grace.  I highly recommend Addy for your loved one, you won't be disappointed.  She's trustworthy and respectful on top of it all.

description.displayText:
Addy has been an absolute god - send!  I had to bring my mom home with me to NJ from FL to stay with me for a month. My mom has advanced Alzheimer's disease and she is very moody.  Addy came into the picture and helped care for my mom in a most loving, patient and compassionate way.  My mom refers to Addy as her 'friend'.  Addy has assisted us with all of my mom's care needs.  She gets my mom ready, bathes her, grooms her and feeds her, takes her for walks and outings, all with kindness and regardless of my mom's mood swings.  
I work in the corporate world and have sales calls all day.  I never have to worry about my mom when Addy is here.  
I would highly recommend Addy, she's respectful, follows instructions and has kept my mom super happy while I work.  She's accommodating to my long hours and stays as long as I need her too, sometimes up to 50 hours a week.  I am grateful for this angel of a person to have come into our lives during these trying times.

description.displayText: Addy took care of my elderly father who has cancer and heart issues.  She had to deal with difficult situation almost immediately and was calm and thorough.  She can help dress feed bathe give medications check BP. She's sympathetic helpful and kind .  Highly recommend.

description.displayText: Addy has been a blessing to us, while caring for our mother.  She is very reliable and on point. Our mother raves on how Addy on physician visits, whips out her laptop to show her medical history to the physicians and is very thorough.  We are very pleased with you Addy and look forward to long term relationship.  Thank you, Llynn and K.
